title: Craft Everything In One
markdown:
# Craft Everything In One

# Titles

# Title

## Subtitle

### Heading

#### Strong

Body

<caption>Caption</caption>

We also have dividers

That are extralight like this one

***

This one is light

****

This one is regular

*****

This one is strong!

******

And this one is a page break

*******

This is a block of text with different formatting including **bold**, *italics*, ~strikethrough~, and a `code inline`.

Here is a code block with javascript formatting applied to it:

```javascript
// A simple variable
const greeting = "Hello, world!";

// A function that takes a name and says hi
function sayHello(name) {
  console.log(`${greeting} My name is ${name}.`);
}

sayHello("Gemini");


```

Here is a link to my website: [https://ashrafali.net](https://ashrafali.net)

And here it is in a smart link with three formats:

[Ashraf Ali](https://ashrafali.net)

[Ashraf Ali](https://ashrafali.net)

[Ashraf Ali](https://ashrafali.net)

You can even put things like YouTube:

[Easy One-Pot Chicken Dinner Recipe | Home Movies with Alison Roman](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bl8GK7tjqOU)

Or put a Figma link:

[Figma](https://www.figma.com/make/tZ3VCGR1NybMXpYPtUCFQT/Interactive-Components-Tutorial?fullscreen=1&t=zk3ynxFX0aIaieCf-1)

Here is a formula!

```math_formula
d_1 = \frac{1}{\sigma \sqrt{t}} \left[ \ln\left(\frac{S_t}{K}\right) + \left(r + \frac{\sigma^2}{2}\right)t \right]
```

And here is a collapsable and expandable section

  + And this is sub item 2

+ And this section is collapsed B with nothing under

We also have decorations which include

> Focus on items, and this one has no color

<callout>Or putting items in a Block, and this has no color</callout>

> <caption>And this focus has a color of purple with caption</caption>

<callout># And this block has a color of green with a title</callout>

Paragraphs can be left aligned.

Or they can be centered

Or they can be right aligned

Or even justified

They can have colors as well including the default.

Or something red

Or even orange.

This is the system font with orange.

And this is the Serif font with blue.

And this is the mono font with brown.

And this is the round font with purple.
